directions: in a large bowl, mix together sweetened condensed milk, coffee creamer and hazelnut liqueur. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into pie crusts, and lightly sift cocoa on top. Freeze for 8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: 1/2 cup Irish cream flavored non dairy creamer, liquid
1 (16 ounce) package extra creamy frozen whipped topping, thawed
2 prepared 8 inch pastry shells, baked and cooled
title: Secret Fantasy Pie
